revised_title: Velocity of Sound in General Relativity and Fluid Sphere with Constant Sound Velocity
tldr: The authors investigate the velocity of sound in general relativity and discuss the problem of a fluid sphere with a constant velocity of sound. They find that the velocity of sound never exceeds the speed of light and is finite even in incompressible matter. The study also examines the Schwarzschild solution for the interior of a fluid sphere and its limitations.
